lines.text: Wanna go to the dump and shoot some rats?
You got a terrific body, you really do. Round. I like round. And I don't mean fat! You got some heft. Makes a fella feel like he's been someplace.

[while Hattie is struggling to replace a tire on the car]
What's the matter? Nobody said it was going to be a picknick. You know I can't risk my hands.
This is my one day off, I want a talking girl.
First time I had sex, 7 years old.
D'you like that? I knew you would. They say I'm a wonderful lover.
I had a wonderful evening. I don't need a genius to have a good time.
What do you think of when you play? What goes through your mind?
Yeah, that I'm underpaid. I think about that sometimes.

[Monologue]
Any woman would be second to his music. He wouldn't miss me any more than the woman he abruptly left. He could only feel pain for his music.
I didn't ask your opinion. I'm just telling ya how it's gonna go.
Do you get a bigger kick doing this, or stealing small objects?
No genius is worth too much heartache.
I can make my guitar sound just like a train!
